articles.content: With May around the corner (nope, we can't believe it either), there are just a few days until the most important day in every Star Wars fan's calendar: May the 4th. If, like Luke Skywalker, you've been living on a remote island (and drinking weird green milk… [+2549 chars]

articles.author: Paige Holland
articles.title: Film star's son goes live on air without trousers on - doesn't realise viewers could see - Mirror Online
articles.description: Christopher Reeve's son Will Reeve went live on Good Morning America but doesn't realise that everyone could see he wasn't wearing any trousers
articles.content:
A reporter made the very relatable working from home decision to take a video call dressed only from the waist up.
However, his call was actually a live interview on Good Morning America, and he had no idea that viewers could see he wasn't wearing any trouse… [+2322 chars]

articles.description: PRINCE CHARLES opened up on how grateful he is to his late Welsh tutor Edward ‘Tedi' Millward following his death.

articles.title: A New Discworld Adaptation is in the Works - Kotaku UK
articles.description: The new series will remain "absolutely faithful" to the original books.
articles.content:

articles.author: Harriet Mallinson
articles.title: Prince William will no longer have to do this when he’s King - but Kate Middleton will - Express
articles.description: PRINCE WILLIAM, 37, and Kate Middleton, 38, are a major couple in the British Royal Family. The Duke of Cambridge is Queen Elizabeth's grandson and therefore the future King. One major travel rule will change for William when his role advances.
